english.segment1: Verse 1: All creation cries to you. Worshipping in Spirit and in truth. Glory to the faithful one Jesus Christ God's son
english.segment2: Verse 2: All Creation gives you praise. You alone are truly great. You alone are God who reigns for eternity
english.segment3: Chorus: God is great and his praise. Fills the earth, fills the heavens. And Your name will be praised. Through all the world
english.segment4: God is great sing His praise. All the earth, all the heavens. 'Cause were living for the Glory of Your name. The Glory of your name
english.segment5: Verse 3: All to you Oh God we bring. Jesus teach us how to live. Let your fire burn in us. That all may hear and all may see
english.segment6: Bridge: Holy is the Lord. The whole earth sings. The whole earth sings
